Log<TState>(LogLevel, EventId, TState, Exception, Func<TState, Exception, String>)

Writes a log message at the specified log level.

Declaration
public void Log<TState>(LogLevel logLevel, EventId eventId, TState state, Exception exception, Func<TState, Exception, string> formatter)
Parameters
Type Name Description
LogLevel logLevel

The log level of the message.
EventId eventId

The event ID for the log message.
TState state

The state object for the log message.
System.Exception exception

An optional exception object for the log message.
System.Func<TState, System.Exception, System.String> formatter

A delegate for formatting the log message.

Name Description
